item.title: 수식 표현을 위해 PaperMod 테마 수정하기
item.description: 1. layouts/partials/extend_head.html 수정하기 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 {{- /* Insert any custom code (web-analytics, resources, etc.) - it will appear in the <head></head> section of every page. */ -}} {{- /* Can be overwritten by partial with the same name in the global layouts. */ -}} {{- /* Head custom content area end */ -}} + {{ if or .Params.math .Site.Params.math }}
